sourcesContent:
<template>
  <canvas id="gobang" style="width: 600px;height: 600px"></canvas>
</template>

<script>
import {onMounted} from "vue";

export default {
  name: "chessboard",
  setup(){
    onMounted(()=>{
        // 画棋盘
      let container=document.getElementById("gobang");
      let ctx=container.getContext("2d");
      //ctx.translate(70,70);
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.fillStyle = "#fff";
        ctx.rect(0, 0, 10, 5);
        ctx.fill();
        ctx.stroke();

    })
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
